divs: Sighting Details24 Oct 2003, 2020hrs. I was set up for Stargazing @ the East Gate of Area 51, 2 miles from back gate. Sitting in lawn chair facing South, with a great view 360* Looked at My watch it was 2015 hrs. while sitting & facing south (no light out there)I seen A Large FireBall entering in the area of the constallation Capricornus. Fireball started out small orange ball then turn into a large bright ball of fire. Then within 5 minutes another one did the same. Both Dimmed down to little lights going to the west. After that I was inlighted. I know that it was a ufo. Apon the sighting the objests did a waving moting while intering the atmostphere ~~~~ then go to a pinpoint light and went west and faded out.
Summary: Two Fireballs intering Earths Atmostphere (southwest) in Capricornus
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rachel,Nv
This sighting has never been favorited.
